name: Torchlight Hero
description:
Catch Ghosts with the help of your torch and your dog in this small, arcade-style game made for Godot Wild Jam #26.

Note : There may be a bug where no batteries spawn on the second playthrough, just close and open again and it will work fine

Programming by theIncompetentgamedev

Art by AidanSketches

Music by gorrgolem

Theme : Spooky

Wildcard : Hey! Listen! (Companion Character)
